features: Package Include - Our mini hand broom dustpan set include 6 pieces dustpan + 6 pieces brushes, immediately solve your cleaning troubles, creating a healthy environment

Premium Material - Our mini dust pan and brush set is made of high quality plastic material, which is eco-friendly, lightweight smooth and durable; The compact brush is soft, and scratch-free, easy to clean efficiently

Easy to Store - The mini hand broom and dustpan sets is sturdy, constructed for durability. Our dust pan and broom set with small loops in the handles top, and the brush snaps into dustpan design are perfect for easy storing

Multiple Purpose - Our cleaning tools are great ideal for cleaning the small pets and even kids mealtime messes and more on keyboard, cars, table, countertop to keep your living environment clean and tidy

Flexible and Practical - Great for daily use, easy to remove items from sofa, table top, countertop, and other small hard reach places. With super absorbent coral fleece cleaning cloth/towel, can quickly wipe clean desktop

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for little ones to use!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these for my students to help with cleanup after snack. They are super light, easy for little ones to hold and use, are in bright colors they like, and seem pretty sturdy for daily use. These are just the perfect size for them to clean up small spills (while developing independence skill), and helps them easily store the mini sweep broom and dustpan together because they nest perfectly into one another. The mini dustpan set is easily stored on hooks in our snack area and because it has larger hanging loop opening in the handles, it is easy for children to take down and hang back up easily. Having 2 of each color in this set of 6 makes it easy for friends to share, and get the color they like when they want to help. I am very happy with this set and my students love it too. Works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great deal. Convenient size.
reviews.reviewText: Very good purchase. I have several pet cages and these are such a handy size and getting three of them for this price was a great deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't waste your money
reviews.reviewText: Theses are the cheapest, flimsyist things I have ever seen. Going back today!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cheap & Sturdy... But the plastic?
reviews.reviewText: I was expecting these brooms to be thinner and crappy for the price but they are actually fairly sturdy for my expectations. Cloths appear to be a soft microfiber material.My only complaint, is the amount of plastic. Each cloth is individually wrapped and then placed in a larger plastic bag. Each broom is also individually wrapped, and everything is placed in a larger zip plastic bag. Then it's mailed in a plastic mailer. I usually am not uptight about plastic but this seems extreme to me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for little hands
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my kindergarten classroom and the kids love them. They are great at cleaning up their messes and love being independent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We use these to clean our small animal cages and they work great. With 6 of these we can use one for each cage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my first graders to use for quick clean-ups in the classroom. They love using them. Fits their tiny hands perfectly and the kids fight over them! Guess I'm going to have to order more, lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handy to have around
reviews.reviewText: Small and lightweight. Greta for quick cleanups. The clothes that came with them are so soft. I want to use them to wash my face.
